org.apache.flink.api.java

类 LocalEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.ExecutionEnvironment
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.LocalEnvironment

  • @Public
public class LocalEnvironment
extends ExecutionEnvironment
    An ExecutionEnvironment that runs the program locally, multi-threaded, in the JVM where the environment is instantiated.

    When this environment is instantiated, it uses a default parallelism of 1. The default parallelism can be set via ExecutionEnvironment.setParallelism(int).

    Local environments can also be instantiated through ExecutionEnvironment.createLocalEnvironment() and ExecutionEnvironment.createLocalEnvironment(int). The former version will pick a default parallelism equal to the number of hardware contexts in the local machine.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  LocalEnvironment.ExecutorReaper
      A class that, upon finalization, shuts down the local mini cluster by triggering the reaper thread.
      private static class  LocalEnvironment.ShutdownThread
      This thread shuts down the local executor.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Configuration configuration
      The user-defined configuration for the local execution.
      private PlanExecutor executor
      Create lazily upon first use.
      private LocalEnvironment.ExecutorReaper executorReaper
      In case we keep the executor alive for sessions, this reaper shuts it down eventually.

    • 字段详细资料

      • configuration

        private final Configuration configuration
        The user-defined configuration for the local execution.

      • executor

        private PlanExecutor executor
        Create lazily upon first use.

      • executorReaper

        private LocalEnvironment.ExecutorReaper executorReaper
        In case we keep the executor alive for sessions, this reaper shuts it down eventually. The reaper's finalize method triggers the executor shutdown.

    • 方法详细资料

      • execute

        public JobExecutionResult execute(java.lang.String jobName)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: ExecutionEnvironment
        Triggers the program execution. The environment will execute all parts of the program that have resulted in a "sink" operation. Sink operations are for example printing results (DataSet.print(), writing results (e.g. DataSet.writeAsText(String), DataSet.write(org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileOutputFormat, String), or other generic data sinks created with DataSet.output(org.apache.flink.api.common.io.OutputFormat).

        The program execution will be logged and displayed with the given job name.

        指定者:
        execute 在类中 ExecutionEnvironment
        返回:
        The result of the job execution, containing elapsed time and accumulators.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the program executions fails.

      • getExecutionPlan

        public java.lang.String getExecutionPlan()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: ExecutionEnvironment
        Creates the plan with which the system will execute the program, and returns it as a String using a JSON representation of the execution data flow graph. Note that this needs to be called, before the plan is executed.
        指定者:
        getExecutionPlan 在类中 ExecutionEnvironment
        返回:
        The execution plan of the program, as a JSON String.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the compiler could not be instantiated, or the master could not be contacted to retrieve information relevant to the execution planning.
